LanguageData.RaiderEmu.label: Raider Emu
LanguageData.RaiderEmu.description: An Emu redesignated to serve its owner's purpose. Hard to kill due to its thick plated armour. Runs on steel and cold hatred which allows it to dominate the battlefield.
LanguageData.RaiderEmu.tools.claws.label: claws
LanguageData.RaiderEmu.tools.head.label: head
